  "Broker Comment" : "THE MATTER WAS SETTLED FOR $23,500.  I WAS NOT CONSULTED AND DID NOT PARTICIPATE IN THE SETTLEMENT.  I DO NOT BELIEVE THE INVESTMENT WAS UNSUITABLE OR THAT THERE WAS ANY FRAUD. THE CUSTOMER WAS A PHOTOGRAPHER, THE SAME BUSINESS AS THE COMPANY, AND HAD PROFITED ON A PREVIOUS INVESTMENT IN AMST SHARES.  THE COMPANY ANNOUNCED REDUCED EARNINGS AND THE STOCK PRICE DROPPED SUBSTANTIALLY.  ONLY THEN DID THE CUSTOMER COMPLAIN.
